subSections.title: Readings
Etymology
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|はやし|yomi=k}}

The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||stem or continuative form}} of verb {{m|ja|囃す|tr=hayasu||to [[play]] [[accompaniment]]}}.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|はやし}}

# {{altspell|lang=ja|囃子|tr=hayashi|nodot=1|sort=はやし}}: [[music]]al [[accompaniment]] for Japanese [[traditional]] [[performing arts]] such as ''[[kabuki]]'', ''[[noh]]'', etc.
